about_the_game:
Plunge into the abyss of terror with Descending Horror, a spine-chilling horror game that takes you deep into the heart of a Dark, nightmarish cave system. As you venture further into the darkness, the air grows heavier, and the silence is shattered by the echoes of your own fear. Each step takes you closer to the unknown, where ancient secrets, malevolent entities, and psychological torment await.

Key Features:

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Navigate a hauntingly beautiful cave environment brought to life with dynamic lighting, eerie soundscapes, and a palpable sense of dread.

  • Survival and Discovery: Solve cryptic notes, uncover hidden passages, and gather limited resources as you strive to escape the ever-tightening grip of the cave.

  • Psychological Horror: Experience a descent not just into the earth but into the depths of your own psyche, where reality and imagination blur.

  • Dynamic Threats: Encounter malevolent forces that react to your actions, keeping you on edge with unpredictable encounters and escalating danger.

  • Immersive Narrative: Unravel the story of those who came before you—and why they never returned—through environmental storytelling.

Are you brave enough to face the darkness? Your only way out is down.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
